name: Palumbo's Sacrifice
description:
You play the role of an apprentice alchemist, your task is to gather the ingredients from nearby forests that are packed with dangerous plants. 

Only after all this hard work and huge personal sacrifice will you begin to learn the mystical science of alchemy

Art: Thomas Leonard (aka captainstupid)

Feel free to use the art however you see fit. - Thomas

Code: Raúl Rita
